statements: SELECT * FROM building_material_prices;
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_material_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_material_prices WHERE price > 100;
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_material_prices WHERE date_recorded = '2022-03-15';
SELECT material_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM building_material_prices GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT * FROM building_material_prices WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_material_prices WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT material_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM building_material_prices GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT * FROM building_material_prices WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY material_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM building_material_prices;
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, price FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM MaterialTrends ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM BuildingMaterials ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT material_name, price FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT material_name, price FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE material_name LIKE 'W%'
SELECT material_name, price FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE price BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT m.material_name, mt.price FROM BuildingMaterials m INNER JOIN MaterialTrends mt ON m.material_id = mt.material_id WHERE mt.observation_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY mt.price ASC
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_materials WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM material_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT trend_id, price, date FROM price_trends WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT material_name, price, date FROM building_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'Brick%';
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_materials WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, price, date FROM building_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY price ASC, date DESC;

SELECT m.material_name, p.price, pt.date FROM building_materials m JOIN price_trends pt ON m.material_id = pt.material_id JOIN material_suppliers p ON m.material_id = p.supplier_id WHERE m.material_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE material_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_materials WHERE price > 50;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM building_materials JOIN material_prices ON building_materials.id = material_prices.material_id JOIN suppliers ON material_prices.supplier_id = suppliers.id;
SELECT * FROM material_availability WHERE available_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_materials WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, price FROM material_prices JOIN suppliers ON material_prices.supplier_id = suppliers.id ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT AVG(price) as avg_price, Sum(available_quantity) as total_quantity FROM material_prices JOIN material_availability ON material_prices.material_id = material_availability.material_id AND material_prices.supplier_id = material_availability.supplier_id;

SELECT material_name, supplier_name, price FROM material_prices JOIN building_materials ON material_prices.material_id = building_materials.id JOIN suppliers ON material_prices.supplier_id = suppliers.id WHERE date_recorded > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, price FROM BuildingMaterials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE price > 50;
SELECT style_name, material_name FROM MaterialStyles JOIN BuildingMaterials ON MaterialStyles.material_id = BuildingMaterials.material_id;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM Suppliers;
SELECT material_name, price FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE price > 100
SELECT style_name, material_name FROM MaterialStyles INNER JOIN BuildingMaterials ON MaterialStyles.material_id = BuildingMaterials.material_id
SELECT history_date, price FROM PriceHistory ORDER BY history_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT supplier_name, price FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN RegionalPrices ON Suppliers.material_id = RegionalPrices.material_id ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT region_id, price FROM RegionalPrices WHERE history_date > '2022-01-01'
